QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.measurement_id , t.person_id , t.measurement_concept_id , t.measurement_date , t.measurement_datetime , t.measurement_time , t.measurement_type_concept_id , t.operator_concept_id , t.value_as_number , t.value_as_concept_id , t.unit_concept_id , t.range_low , t.range_high , t.provider_id , t.visit_occurrence_id , t.visit_detail_id , t.measurement_source_value , t.measurement_source_concept_id , t.unit_source_value , t.value_source_value , t.unit_source_concept_id , t.measurement_event_id , t.meas_event_field_concept_id FROM {sc}.measurement as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
